metadata.dc:author: Hernández Moñiz, F
Pérez, A
Pertierra, M A
Barrio, A
Salafranca, J M
González, M
metadata.dc:description: We report the results of a therapeutic trial of patients with tinnitus of different characteristics that was unresponsive to other medical or surgical treatments. Treatment was based on a combination of biofeedback training designed to reduce stress and either pure masking therapy or masking therapy consisting of a hearing aid and masker. The results showed an improvement in subjective perceptions and in the audiometric parameter of pitch in a significant percentage of patients.
metadata.dc:title: Ensayo terapéutico prospectivo mediante tratamiento enmascarador en pacientes con acufenos.
[Prospective therapeutic trial of masking treatment in patients with tinnitus].
